data.eml:eml: Neocaridinafonticulata, a new land-locked freshwater shrimp from Hengchun Peninsula, Taiwan (Decapoda, Caridea, Atyidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shih, Hsi-Te, Cai, Yixiong, Chiu, Yuh-Wen (2019): Neocaridinafonticulata, a new land-locked freshwater shrimp from Hengchun Peninsula, Taiwan (Decapoda, Caridea, Atyidae). ZooKeys 817: 11-23, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.817.29332, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.817.29332
